items.name: Select Position and Size
items.windowSizeFormula: var res = GS.GAME.previewResolution(); return { w: res.w + GS.CONST.WINDOW_PADDING }
items.rawContent:
{
    "parentId": "AC1ABDCBK050BA4863S9964E3DC378247DAD",
"name": "Select Position and Size",
    "windowTitle": "$$BFD6BD080E6D814B186BF8C3267121BA64E3",
    "type": "custom_view",
    "windowSize": {
        "w": 400, "h": 400
    },
    "windowSizeFormula": "var res = GS.GAME.previewResolution(); return { w: res.w + GS.CONST.WINDOW_PADDING }",
    "sections": [
        {
            "name": "Position",
            "identifier": "positionSection",
            "noBorder": true,
            "column": 0,
            "items": [
                {
                    "type": "GSLabel",
                    "text": "$$2DD5576B314560493B5ACDB32E6C8F750939",
                    "frame": [0, 0],
                    "group": "labels"
                },
                {
                    "type": "GSResourcePopupField",
                    "folder": "Graphics/Backgrounds",
                    "identifier": "resource",
                    "defaultValue": { "name": "$live_preview_snapshot" },
                    "attribute": "previewBackground",
                    "bindings": [{ "source": "image", "to": "positionView", "target": "backgrounds.0" }],
                    "frame": [1, 0]
                },
                {
                    "type": "GSDispositionView",
                    "border": true,
                    "dynamic": true,
                    "storeMode": "single",
                    "cellCount": 1,
                    "cellColor": { "red": 0, "green": 0, "blue": 0, "alpha": 160 },
                    "cells": [{ "size": { "width": 100, "height": 100 }, "color": [0, 0, 0, 160] }],
                    "cellPropertiesDialog": { "uid": "FC1930800642064D2468130859A2019F98B5" },
                    "identifier": "positionView",
                    "attribute": "object",
                    "allowCellResize": true,
                    "scaleForPreview": true,
                    "frame": [0, 1],
                    "sizeFormula": "return GS.GAME.previewResolution();"
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}
